text: Bettange-sur-Mess Castle Bettange-sur-Mess Castle () is located in the village of Bettange-sur-Mess near Dippach in the southwest of Luxembourg. Built in 1753 by René Louis de Geisen, the castle has changed ownership several times. Since 1996, it has been a retraining centre for mentally handicapped persons run by the Association des Parents d’Enfants Mentalement Handicapés."Histoire de la commune" , Commune de Dippach. Retrieved 4 April 2011.Bernhard Peter, "Das Schloß in Bettingen-Mess (Bettange-Mess, Luxembourg)" .
